videos.description: Goga Bitadze grabs his own miss and then finishes through contact for the hoop and the harm.

videos.description: After eight months apart, Aaron Kern is surprised by his daughter at a Pacers game.

videos.headline: U.S. soldier has heartwarming reunion with daughter at Pacers game

videos.description: Myles Turner denies Alperen Sengun's attempt to score inside.

videos.headline: Turner stuffs Sengun at the rim

videos.description: In his first game in nearly a month, Rockets rookie Jalen Green knocks down six 3-pointers in a 20-point performance.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Jalen Green racks up 20 points, six 3s in return to court) 2021/12/24 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Jalen Green racks up 20 points, six 3s in return to court
